'''The Art of War''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating 4 opponents with [[Overloaded]] within two seconds.

==Trivia==
* The English name "The Art of War" is a reference to the ancient Chinese military treatise ''{{w|The Art of War}}'' by {{w|Sunzi}}.
* The Chinese name {{Lang|"The Art is..."|zh=艺术就是…}} is a reference to a famous line {{Lang|"The art is an explosion!"|zh=艺术就是爆炸！|ja=芸術は爆発だ！}} in ''{{w|Naruto}}'', said by antagonist Deidara.
